verbs.description: [ARG0: Daniels] [V: claims] [ARG1: that she was threatened by an unidentified man in a Las Vegas parking lot in 2011 to stay quiet about her affair with Trump] .
Daniels claims that she [V: was] threatened by an unidentified man in a Las Vegas parking lot in 2011 to stay quiet about her affair with Trump .
Daniels claims that [ARG2: she] was [V: threatened] [ARG0: by an unidentified man] [ARGM-LOC: in a Las Vegas parking lot] [ARGM-TMP: in 2011] [ARGM-PRP: to stay quiet about her affair with Trump] .
Daniels claims that [ARG1: she] was threatened by an unidentified man in a Las Vegas parking lot in 2011 to [V: stay] [ARG3: quiet about her affair with Trump] .
